title: Musk Aims for Twitter to Be a ‘Positive Force for Civilization’

title: Chinese Leader Xi Jinping Meets With Bill Gates Ahead of Blinken Visit

title: Meta’s Facebook, Instagram Down for Thousands of Users, Says Downdetector

title: TikTok Reveals Everything About Users and Those Around Them: Expert

title: TikTok to Invest Billions of Dollars in Southeast Asia to Boost E-Commerce Business
description: TikTok Chief Executive Officer Shou Zi Chew delivers his speech during the launch of TikTok Socio-Economic Impact Report 2023 event at The Ritz Carlton, Pacific Place in Jakarta, Indonesia, on June 15, 2023. (Ajeng Dinar Ulfiana/Reuters)
